Class Field

java.lang.Object
Field
public class Field extends Object
Represent a rectangular grid of field positions. Each position stores a single cell
Version:
2022.01.06 (1)
Author:
David J. Barnes, Michael KÃ¶lling & Jeffery Raphael

      Represent a field of the given dimensions.

  • Method Details

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Empty the field.

    • clear

      public void clear(Location location)
      Clear the given location.
      Parameters:
      location - The location to clear.

    • place

      public void place(Cell cell, int row, int col)
      Place a cell at the given location. If there is already a cell at the location it will be lost.
      Parameters:
      cell - The cell to be placed.
      row - Row coordinate of the location.
      col - Column coordinate of the location.

    • place

      public void place(Cell cell, Location location)
      Place a cell at the given location. If there is already a cell at the location it will be lost.
      Parameters:
      cell - The cell to be placed.
      location - Where to place the cell.

    • getObjectAt

      public Cell getObjectAt(Location location)
      Return the cell at the given location, if any.
      Parameters:
      location - Where in the field.
      Returns:
      The cell at the given location, or null if there is none.

    • getObjectAt

      public Cell getObjectAt(int row, int col)
      Return the cell at the given location, if any.
      Parameters:
      row - The desired row.
      col - The desired column.
      Returns:
      The cell at the given location, or null if there is none.

    • randomAdjacentLocation

      public Location randomAdjacentLocation(Location location)
      Generate a random location that is adjacent to the given location, or is the same location. The returned location will be within the valid bounds of the field.
      Parameters:
      location - The location from which to generate an adjacency.
      Returns:
      A valid location within the grid area.

    • adjacentLocations

      public List<Location> adjacentLocations(Location location)
      Return a shuffled list of locations adjacent to the given one. The list will not include the location itself. All locations will lie within the grid.
      Parameters:
      location - The location from which to generate adjacencies.
      Returns:
      A list of locations adjacent to that given.

    • getLivingNeighbours

      public List<Cell> getLivingNeighbours(Location location)
      Get a shuffled list of living neighbours
      Parameters:
      location - Get locations adjacent to this.
      Returns:
      A list of living neighbours

    • getDepth

      public int getDepth()
      Return the depth of the field.
      Returns:
      The depth of the field.

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Return the width of the field.
      Returns:
      The width of the field.
